Class Phunware

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Makes requests against the Phunware API.

                              PlacementResponseListener listener)
        Requests multiple placements.
        Parameters:
        configs - the configurations, each used for one placement respectively.
        listener - the results, when ready, will be given to this given listener.
